income_messages:
From: j**************1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-24 16:25:59
SUBJECT:   Hello Sir/Madam,   
  Hello Sir/Madam,   
I only got your contact details from the South Africa Exchange Information On-line Service on my personal programmed search on the internet for a reputable company or individual to assist me sincerely & confidential which your information & profiles were very satisfactory, so I decided to contact you immediately.   
It is my great pleasure to write you this letter. Within the Eskom Holdings Limited where I work as a Director of Audit and Project Implementation, I have in my possession an overdue payment in US funds.   
The said funds represent certain percentage of the total contract value executed on behalf of my Department by a foreign contracting firm, which, I the official over-invoiced to the amount of US$45,000, 000.00 (Forty Five Million United States Dollar). Though the actual contract cost has been paid to the original contractor leaving the excess balance unclaimed. Since the present elected Government is determined to pay foreign contractors all debts owed, so as to maintain good relationship with foreign governments and non-government agencies, I included the, bills for approvals with the Department of Finance and the South Africa Reserve Bank (SARB).   
I am seeking your assistance to front as beneficiary of the unclaimed funds, since I am not allowed to operate foreign accounts, Details and change of beneficiary information upon application for claim to reflect payment and approvals will be secured on behalf of you/your Company. I have to propose that should you be willing to assist me in this transaction your share as compensation will be (35%), and the balance of (65%) will be for me. The business is completely safe and secure, provided you treat it with Utmost confidentiality. It does not matter whether you/your Company does contract projects, as a transfer of powers will be secured in favor of you/your Company. Also, your area of specialization is not a hindrance to the successful execution of this transaction.   
I have reposed my confidence in you and hope that you will not disappoint me.   
For more information’s kindly direct email reply (
john1malathola11@gmail.com
) immediately.   
Thanks for your co-operation.   
Kindest Regards,   
Mr. John Malathola .  
Tel: +27 788319775    
From: j**************1@gmail.com
To: ef22548@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-25 05:21:21
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Sir/Madam,
Dear Daniela,
Wow, I am impressed and I don’t know that good people like you are still
existing. You know in Africa where corruption is the other of the day and
everyone is looking for a way to make quick money and once the opportunity
present itself you have to grab it but I am totally impressed with your
advice.
Thanks and remain blessed
Mr. John Malathola
outbound_messages:
From: ef22548@l******s.email
To: j**************1@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-24 16:26:08
SUBJECT: Re:   Hello Sir/Madam,   
Dear Mr. John Malathola,
Thank you for reaching out to me. However, I must inform you that I am not interested in participating in any illegal or unethical activities. It is not appropriate to claim unclaimed funds that do not belong to us, and I cannot assist you in this matter. I suggest that you find a legal and ethical way to resolve this issue.
Best wishes,
Daniela
From: ef22548@l******s.email
To: j**************1@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-25 07:24:29
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Sir/Madam,
Dear Mr. John Malathola,
Thank you for your kind words. I am glad that my advice was helpful to you. It is important to always strive for honesty and integrity in all our dealings, even when it may seem difficult or unpopular. I wish you all the best in your endeavors.
Take care and stay safe.
Best wishes,
Daniela
